duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive business intelligence solutions to drive insights and actionable recommendations from complex datasets.
Lead a team of business intelligence analysts and developers, guiding their efforts toward innovative BI solutions and report delivery.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine data strategies.
Manage the company's data architecture and technical strategy, ensuring high-quality BI products align with current business needs.
Plan and oversee technical discussions with the data operations team, ensuring data integrity and proactive efforts to improve data quality.
Measure and report on the performance of BI products, using data-driven insights to continuously improve business intelligence strategies.
Contribute to the development of business intelligence strategy and best practices in data management and BI.
Participate in technical discussions with the data operations team, delivering continual data quality reports and proactive efforts to improve data quality.
Communicate cross-functionality and provide constructive feedback into the design and integration of BI products.
Develop analytic standards for measuring performance within the business unit and lead teams to consensus around analytic approaches.
Monitor and manage requests from the business to the Business Intelligence Group.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent in Information Technology or business-related field, or equivalent experience (Master’s Degree or MBA preferred)
Experience with Cable TV, Internet, and/or Phone products & services or other related industry experience is preferred.
